storyInfo: On the eve of the finals, the Infected discuss a way out for the future while the General Chamber of Commerce and the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi keep each other in check. Maria and Margaret have a sisterly heart-to-heart, and everyone solemnly waits for the arrival of the finals.

attributes.content: The Blood Knight has successfully made his way to the finals, becoming only the second knight in the history of the Kazimierz Major to have a chance of defending his title.
attributes.name: A Voice on the News

attributes.content: However, the Blood Knight's status as an Infected continues to draw criticism. A General Chamber of Commerce spokesman came out with this statement: 'The Blood Knight will not be treated differently on the basis of his status as an Infected'––
attributes.name: A Voice on the News

attributes.content: Nevertheless, some knight families do not agree with this statement, and in light of the recent power outage and recurrence of the Great Separation, an incredible amount of public pressure has been mounting. Next, we invite a representative of the Knights Association to speak on the matter––
attributes.name: A Voice on the News

attributes.content: ...Dikaiopolis! The Blood Knight!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Haha! Now that's what I'm talking about! That's how an Infected knight should be!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If the Radiant Knight defeats the Wind Knight, then...
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: It'll be Infected against Infected.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: The champion of the Major will be decided between the Infected.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Haha! Isn't that a good thing?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: We'll show those bigwigs that their shining city isn't so invincible after all. Then, the Blood Knight and the Radiant Knight will tear off their veil of secrecy and reveal their crimes––
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The Infected will finally taste victory!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: If only things could be so simple.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: As for us, what do we do next?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Ahaha... Well, it's not like we have any future in the Grand Knight Territory anyway.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: But we can get our hands on some legal papers and find some place, maybe a nice village, to quietly live our lives.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: That's not what we set out to do.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: We're not ready to stash away our armor and pick up the plow just yet, Sona!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Are we not fighting to make sure those suffering from Oripathy can be treated fairly?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: The purpose of us informing the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi about what the K.G.C.C. has been doing in Area 0... Was that not to save more Infected?!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Our job here isn't done yet!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: I can't really argue with that, Sona.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: If we leave now, it'd be like giving up halfway.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Sona?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Why will most of the Infected be left behind?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: No, that isn't the right question. Let me think... Why do the Infected... never seem to matter?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Workers exposed to high-risk environments, farmers with no way to avoid Catastrophes, the homeless who wander between cities with nowhere to go... These are the people most afflicted by Oripathy.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: ...A refined gemstone.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: That might be the first Originium the knight-nobles ever saw.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Of course Oripathy doesn't concern them.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Why do you pose that question?
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: No reason in particular.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Will Szewczyk go with us?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: What nonsense are you going on about now?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Oh, you were here all along.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: How's the wife and kid?
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Well. That's why I came by to give my regards. As long as they're safe, anything else goes.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: However, I am no Infected. On the face of it, I can even retain my legal status as a knight.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: I don't plan to stay in the Grand Knight Territory. I'll use the prize money I earned over the years to buy some property and start a new life in a different city.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Have you considered living somewhere other than a nomadic city? It'll probably be better for avoiding unwanted eyes and ears.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: That isn't 'living,' that's called 'surviving'
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Anyway, I'm here to say goodbye. The Major isn't over yet, and there are many people moving in and out. It's a good opportunity to quietly slip out of the Grand Knight Territory.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: A new city, huh...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, there's something I have to tell you all.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The fact that the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi has been informed of the Armorless Union and of the Infected containment and treatment facility does not necessarily mean that they'll immediately move to depose the K.G.C.C.––
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: ––No, I'd go far as to say that right now, they don't even have the ability to threaten the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: You likely picked up on this as well, right?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Call me cold if you want, but this has nothing to do with me anymore.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: For the sake of the short time we fought side-by-side... Take care of yourselves. Don't challenge the city, Flametail.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: What, did you just show up to rain on our parade?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: This is why I can't stand knight-nobles.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Challenge... the city, huh.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: It sounds just like one of those silly knight novels...
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I've been your bodyguard for a while. So... what do you think of me?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I'll be honest. Just being in the same as room as you... makes my heart beat a little faster, you know?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Do you need a medic?;......;Now's not the time for personal questions.

attributes.content: Aww... That's too bad.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But I think... You're acting dense on purpose?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Your silence definitely gives you that sort of mysterious allure, but... If you're always so absorbed in your work, Doctor, you'll end up burning out.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: This is a business inquiry regarding the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's partnership with Rhodes Island... Your opinion of me is very important.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Doctor! Nearl reached the grand finals!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'The Wind Knight Forfeits, the Radiant Knight Advances with a Bye!' It was a headline in today's paper!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Wind Knight is only one step away from retirement, and most likely doesn't want to go out with a loss to the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Really makes me jealous of that Radiant Knight, seeing how much you care about her.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: G-Gravel?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, I didn't mean anything by that.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ...At least for now.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Oh, uh... Haha...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (D-Doctor, don't you think Gravel has been in a bad mood recently? She seems to be getting more and more... Huh? You think it's her personality?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Um, all right. If that's what you believe...)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Wait... Hold on...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: How many men do I have?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Three squads.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What about you and Monique?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: We have other work to do.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Don't even think about Darksteel.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: They also have their jobs to do.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Is the Union...
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: If you've figured it out, you'd do best to behave yourself and act like you don't know anything. You do want to live, don't you?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: So, with these three squads, I'm responsible for guarding the Major arena and serving as the early warning, right?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...for the battle of the Blood Knight and the Radiant Knight?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...and with the possibility of coming face-to-face with a Silverlance Pegasus?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: ...Alright. Are you asking me to commit suicide...?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: I wouldn't put it that way. Just don't do anything, and you'll be fine.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: How much longer are you going to use me?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: ––I'm glad you're so self-aware.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What's going to happen to me after the Major is over?
attributes.name: Platinum

attributes.content: Depends on your performance. If you're just asking me though, at least...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'd prefer to let you live.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Uncle...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You've already brought things to this step, doing whatever you feel like, with no concern for others' opinions.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Have you ever thought of all the people you're harming through your juvenile actions?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Have you ever considered that Marcin and the others will now be at the mercy of the Armorless Union?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Have you ever considered that Maria and Zofia may no longer be able to live safely in the Grand Knight Territory?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You may hold your own ideals in a vacuum, Margaret, but remember this: Your greatest mistake is trying to determine the trajectories of other peoples' lives.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: There is not a soul who has that right.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I am extremely disappointed in you.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Margaret...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, tell me the truth.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Did I rob you of your dreams?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You handed both the family name and the right to enter the tournament to me... You...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Margaret! That's never crossed my mind!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I just... don't think I'm cut out to be a knight.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...I'm listening, Maria.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It's been so long since I've heard you... confide in someone else.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I... don't understand what you're doing...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I've been doubting... what the point of a knight even is anymore.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: When we stand victorious in the arena, what is it the audience cheers for? What have we won?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Even if... you wanted to beat them at their own game, to defeat those rogues who want to keep you from winning...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What if they let you win because they get something out of it?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Or, what if they were never beholden to the rules of the game in the first place?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: From the beginning, they never had an ounce of concern about the knights. This, I already knew.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: There is no meaning to me becoming the champion.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But to those watching us... it means the world.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Maria, if you think this city – this country – is sick, what do you think is the root cause of the illness?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The corruption of the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi? The General Chamber of Commerce's endless expansion and exploitation?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: It might be either, or even both.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We often say that Kazimierz needs to regain its former glory, and every so often, someone needs to remind it what glory and justice are.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But it is not just the knights who need to recover that glory.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Victory is not about defeating some enemy. 'To be a knight is to be the noble light that illuminates the land..'
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: But after illuminating the path forward, clearing the thorns, and filling up the pitfalls...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: A knight should have taught all those who seek freedom to overcome hardship.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Finally awake, huh? Took you long enough. Thought you were dead.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: You... You're a Sarkaz...?
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: And you can talk. Looks like you're doing better than your brother.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Don't worry, he's not dead either.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: This special salve is usually used for armor repair. So this is what happens when you apply it directly to humans...
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: The principle behind it is activation? What exactly do Kazimierz suits of armor have in common with humans? Both humans and armor can be activated? Then, what about Originium slugs?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You... You're a de-horned Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Are you... with the Armorless Union?
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Hah, I'll take that as a compliment. Those guys make three thousand times more than I do.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: I'm a bounty hunter. I'm here in the Grand Knight Territory on a bit of business, as well as... a little investigation related to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Of course, it's nothing official. Just a personal curiosity of mine.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ––Have you seen any other Sarkaz with trimmed horns?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Who cut off yours?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Who would use... the Sarkaz... as slaves and test subjects?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: All right. I suppose you've been whipped pretty thoroughly.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Want to come with me?
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: Big guys like you should be able to help out with some handy work, right? We're camped in the wastelands, and we're lacking hands more than anything else–
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Corrupted Knight

attributes.content: ––Come with me, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Come with me, and you just might survive.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Batbayar...?
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You poor lad. Your folks won't even pay the bills for you when you're in the hospital.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: But your body is undoubtedly sturdy. Anyone else in your position wouldn't have much life left in them after a bout with the Blood Knight.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Even if you're an independent knight, you should've at least had some money saved up from making it to the semifinals. Where'd it all go?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Stop moving around. Your wounds are deep.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hey, hold on! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...I'm leaving.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: A golden pegasus, a crimson Minoan. I... I've gained much.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: You're unhappy?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...No, I failed.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I won't fear failure anymore.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I won't be afraid to retreat anymore.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: I won't fear... the beauty of weakness.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: ...But I am still lacking... I have yet to finish my Khaganquest.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: Khaganquest this, Khaganquest that... Do you even know where you're going?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Even in ancient times, it's not like there was a path you were supposed to follow for years, right?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: North.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: In the distant north... the echoing north where my ancestors disappeared.
attributes.name: Nightmare Knight

attributes.content: And after you make your way there, then what?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Are you going to come back?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: You... I assumed you were searching for something you were missing.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: But it turns out... are you searching for a place to die?
attributes.name: Old Knight
